# packages

# standard
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

# plots
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.a7a40ca2:
# load data and first glance
df = pd.read_csv('../input/global-sea-level-1993-2021/sealevel.csv')
df.head()
source.44f49926:
# distribution of years
df.Year.value_counts().sort_index().plot(kind='bar')
plt.title('Values per Year')
plt.grid()
plt.show()
source.a7b9f399:
# distribution of total weighted observations
df.TotalWeightedObservations.plot(kind='hist', bins=50)
plt.title('TotalWeightedObservations')
plt.grid()
plt.show()
source.ee651634:
# same using box plot
df.TotalWeightedObservations.plot(kind='box', vert=False)
plt.title('TotalWeightedObservations')
plt.grid()
plt.show()

for p in perspectives:
    plt.scatter(df.Year, df[p], alpha=0.5)
    plt.title(p)
    plt.grid()
    plt.show()
